data.text: @CBCAdrianH @NoLore @JSchool_CU Interesting premise, media at center as case study, could shed light on how capitalism and decades of austerity is the root of this crisis, Interested to read alternative scenarios & how we might foster more critical media after decades of underfunding & privatizing education.

@CBCAdrianH @NoLore @JSchool_CU It seems like a sociological take on what’s also an epidemiological problem. It sounds like it’s on,y one perspective but fails to look at it from different perspectives. But one thing is certain; some, perhaps many politicians didn’t seem to learn lessons.
@upperfeeny @CBCAdrianH @JSchool_CU @loreto_nicole My cousin! I'll be excited to read anything she writes.

@CBCAdrianH @NoLore @JSchool_CU At quick glance, I thought my dear friend Dr. @loreto_nicole had published her first book. 

Nora, thanks to Adrian I will now visit an independent Ottawa bookstore to purchase your new book.
